plot outline: The story follows Siddhartha who is married and waiting for his first night love. His wife named swathy entering to room and says her dream about love and first date. Due to the restless sentiments Siddhartha booking a honeymoon package from aditi dot com, the hopeful journey finally puts them in danger.
title: Kantharam
plot: Due to the restless sentiments Siddhartha books a honeymoon package from aditi dot com but the hopeful journey end up being dangerous for them.

The story follows Siddhartha who is married and waiting for his first night love. His wife named swathy entering to room and says her dream about love and first date. Due to the restless sentiments Siddhartha booking a honeymoon package from aditi dot com, the hopeful journey finally puts them in danger.
